56 class MoveTo : public PropagatingEitherWay
57 {
58 public:
59  MoveTo(const std::string& name = "move to",
60  const solvers::PlannerInterfacePtr& planner = solvers::PlannerInterfacePtr());
61 
62  void init(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) override;
63  void computeForward(const InterfaceState& from) override;
64  void computeBackward(const InterfaceState& to) override;
65 
66  void setGroup(const std::string& group) { setProperty("group", group); }
68  void setIKFrame(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& pose) { setProperty("ik_frame", pose); }
69  void setIKFrame(const Eigen::Isometry3d& pose, const std::string& link);
70  template <typename T>
71  void setIKFrame(const T& p, const std::string& link) {
72  Eigen::Isometry3d pose;
73  pose = p;
74  setIKFrame(pose, link);
75  }
76  void setIKFrame(const std::string& link) { setIKFrame(Eigen::Isometry3d::Identity(), link); }
77 
79  void setGoal(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& pose) { setProperty("goal", pose); }
80 
82  void setGoal(const geometry_msgs::PointStamped& point) { setProperty("goal", point); }
83 
85  void setGoal(const std::string& named_joint_pose) { setProperty("goal", named_joint_pose); }
86 
88  void setGoal(const moveit_msgs::RobotState& robot_state) { setProperty("goal", robot_state); }
89 
91  void setGoal(const std::map<std::string, double>& joints);
92 
93  void setPathConstraints(moveit_msgs::Constraints path_constraints) {
94  setProperty("path_constraints", std::move(path_constraints));
95  }
96 
97 protected:
98  // return false if trajectory shouldn't be stored
99  bool compute(const InterfaceState& state, planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& scene, SubTrajectory& trajectory,
100  Direction dir);
101  bool getJointStateGoal(const boost::any& goal, const core::JointModelGroup* jmg, moveit::core::RobotState& state);
102  bool getPoseGoal(const boost::any& goal, const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& ik_pose_msg,
103  const planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& scene, Eigen::Isometry3d& target_eigen,
104  decltype(std::declval<SolutionBase>().markers()) & markers);
105  bool getPointGoal(const boost::any& goal, const moveit::core::LinkModel* link,
106  const planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& scene, Eigen::Isometry3d& target_eigen,
107  decltype(std::declval<SolutionBase>().markers()) & /*unused*/);
108 
109 protected:
110  solvers::PlannerInterfacePtr planner_;
111 };
